attributes.action: A law requiring UK businesses to provide a direct telephone line for customers.
attributes.additional_details: More and more businesses  nowadays make themselves remote from customers relying on the individual to do work online. Not all individuals are comfortable with this. It is vexatious and it also damages brands. We need to make sure that businesses do not abdicate their responsibility to help and be accountable to their customers who pay money for their goods and services.
attributes.background: Make sure that these lines are either free or charged at a fair basic rate. Also ensure numbers are  prominent on internet home pages and hard copies of publicity and marketing material.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

All UK companies must provide a manned customer telephone helpline
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649763
